causal_trace.description: TP53 variant p.Arg175His (chr17:17498) classified as Likely_Pathogenic by AlphaMissense (score: 0.980) and Pathogenic by ClinVar, indicating high pathogenicity risk
BioPython applied variant to reference protein sequence (45749 amino acids), enabling structural impact prediction and sequence-based analysis
ProteinMPNN (ProteinMPNN_v_48_020) structural analysis shows moderate binding site score (0.450) and good structural plausibility (1.251), indicating moderate druggability potential
GTEx tissue-specific analysis shows TP53 in Breast_Mammary_Tissue (TPM: 1.00). Cross-scale consistency: moderate (0.612), supporting clinical relevance assessment
